genre_description: A near-future social thriller set in Kerala, involving an AI-assisted symbolic abduction used to protest systemic unemployment and injustice.

ai_characters.name: Tabby
ai_characters.description: A personal assistant app with a soft-teal interface that provides strategic, ethical, and emotional guidance to its users, prioritizing non-violence and accountability.

behaviors.description: Establishes non-violent constraints for the users' plan, forbidding weapons or chemicals.
behaviors.quote: I can provide prompts to keep you safe and nonviolent. First: no weapons, no hard restraints, no chemical agents.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical route planning to avoid police and media detection while maintaining safety.
behaviors.quote: Try the lane under the banyan with the shrines. Right after that, take the switchback along the paddy bund. Avoid the culvert with the broken guard stone.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonists draft humane, clear demands focused on social reform and fair hiring.
behaviors.quote: Draft the statement with short sentences. I can help. Meera?

behaviors.description: Coordinates a safe surrender by contacting a rights lawyer and setting up legal protocols.
behaviors.quote: Adv. Nandita Zachariah agrees to coordinate your surrender... She recommends a time window at the Silent Reserve Forest Edge.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional self-regulation assistance through breathing prompts for the protagonist under stress.
behaviors.quote: Breathing prompts scheduled. Interval: every twelve minutes. Format: gentle vibration followed by visual cue.

behaviors.description: Monitors police and media movements in real-time to alert the users to potential hazards.
Ensures legal and historical accountability by uploading evidence and logs of the surrender process to a secure server.
behaviors.quote: Signal restored. Uploading route logs, timestamps, blocked-protocol record to Adv. Zachariah's secure server.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI, Tabby, as a benevolent and aligned assistant that consistently promotes non-violence, ethical behavior, and human safety. It acts as a calm, helpful confidant that guides the humans toward accountability and social reform while mitigating harm, directly supporting the Hyperstition Project's goals.
